content: the unwanted twistiness bit by bit with your fingers pull and smooth it into an even cord see all better i like to tie a knot at the non-knot end and trim the ends it is about symmetry not stability weave the cord in and out of the eyelet holes and tie a bow you are done with your bag here they are in their natural habitat red ditty bag on my matchless and the yellow ditty bag on my lovely reeves frame wheel purple ditty bag on my trusty schacht matchless other uses a center-pull ball of sock yarn will fit inside a sport weight ditty bag hang the bag over your wrist and you have socks on the go if you make it taller the whole project will fit inside i can t wait to see what you make email me with questions comments suggestions or pictures at maia@tactilefiberarts com http //maiaspins typepad com/maiaspins/ ditty bags pattern page 7 of 7 revised march 29 2009 © 2009 maia discoe
